SEARCH
Module iu.util.type.impl
Package iu.type

Class ComponentFactory

java.lang.Object
iu.type.ComponentFactory
final class ComponentFactory extends Object
Creates instances of Component for TypeSpi.createComponent(InputStream, InputStream...).

  • Method Details

    • checkIfAlreadyProvided

      static void checkIfAlreadyProvided(ComponentArchive alreadyProvidedArchive, ComponentArchive archive)
      Checks a archive version against another archive to verify two don't have the same version name.

      Deletes the archive temp file before throwing IllegalArgumentException if the version names match.

      Parameters:
      alreadyProvidedArchive - archive already in the component path
      archive - archve to verify before adding to the component path.

    • createModular

      static Component createModular(Component parent, Queue<ComponentArchive> archives)
      Creates a modular component.
      Parameters:
      parent - parent component
      archives - component path
      Returns:
      module component

    • createLegacy

      static Component createLegacy(Component parent, Queue<ComponentArchive> archives) throws IOException
      Creates a modular component.
      Parameters:
      parent - parent component
      archives - component path
      Returns:
      module component
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs reading from an archive

    • createFromSourceQueue

      static Component createFromSourceQueue(Component parent, Queue<ArchiveSource> sources) throws IOException
      Creates a component from the source queue.
      Parameters:
      parent - parent component
      sources - source queue; will be drained and all entries closed when the component is closed, or if an initialization error occurs.
      Returns:
      fully loaded component instance
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs reaching from an archive source

    • createComponent

      static Component createComponent(Component parent, InputStream componentArchiveSource, InputStream... providedDependencyArchiveSources) throws IOException
      Creates a component from the source inputs
      Parameters:
      parent - parent component
      componentArchiveSource - component archive source input
      providedDependencyArchiveSources - dependency source inputs
      Returns:
      fully loaded component instance
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs reaching from an archive source
